194069.「やあ いらっしゃい。\n ここは 玩具屋だよ。\n 今日は どんな用かな？:
Hi, welcome. This is the Toy Shop. What can
I do for you today?

194070.「ここは 玩具屋なんだけど……\n 店は まだ 準備中なんだ。\n ごめんな。\:
This is the Toy Shop, but... I'm still setting things up. Sorry about that.
Anyways, if you find any "Pet" Toys, would you be so kind as to bring them to me? I'd really appreciate it!

194072.「新しい 旅の相棒の 誕生だ！\n 大切にしてね！\n<br>\n「というわけで:
You have a new traveling companion! Take good
care of it! So, if there's anything else you
need, I'm at your service.<break>

194073.「それで？\n 今日は どんな用で 来たのかな？\n<break>: So? What brings you here today?<break>

194074.「やあ いらっしゃい。\n ここは 玩具屋だよ。\n<br>\n「キミは 『つい:
Hey, there... This is Toy... Have you ever heard of Tsurette-kun? It's a magical pet that my grandfather created through
alchemy... He's a very cute little guy who moves around a lot and always follows his owner around. The newly created Followers
come in capsules that can be broken in front of their owners to become their pets. If the owner brings the capsule to me, I can break
it open and take the lucky one inside with me. My grandfather is the only alchemist who can make Followers, so I haven't been able to
find anyone who has a capsule.

194075.「ええ！ カプセルのままにしとくのかい？\n そうか……。持ち主はキミだし 仕方:
Oh, my God! You're gonna leave me in stasis?
Well... I mean, you're the owner, so... I'll
call you when I'm ready to take it out...

194076.<pipipi_off>\n<%sL_KAPSEL>が 割られ\n中から ついて:
<pipipi_off>Inside the <%sL_KAPSEL> pops out
a new pet to travel with you!
<end>

194077.「よっしゃー！ まかせて！\n さっそく割っちゃうよ！\n<br>\n<shak:
Okay, here we go! I'm gonna crack it open!
Hoorah! Hnnnnnnnnng!

194078.「おや？\n キミが持ってる それは\n <%sL_MINION>の カプセルじ:
Hmm? Isn't that a <%sL_MINION> you're holding?
It's useless like that, but you'd like to make a pet out of it, right?
If you want, I can break open the capsule and let it out. How about it?

194079.「ん？\n キミは ついてクンを 持っていないようだ。\n 連れ歩くことは でき:
Hmm? You don't have any pets. You can't walk
around with any.

194080.「どこかで ついてクンの カプセルを\n 見つけたら ボクのところに\n 持って:
If you find a Follow Me capsule somewhere, can you bring it to me? I'll break the capsule, and I'll make Follow Me your
sidekick.

194081.「今 連れている ついてクンを\n 休ませてあげるのかい？\n<yesno><c:
Will you let your pet rest now?
<yesno><close>

194084.「連れ歩きたい ついてクンは \n さくせんコマンドの いろいろ設定以下にある\:
If you want one of your pets to follow you, you can select one with "Misc.", "Settings", and then "Pets".
Bring me any new capsules you find, and I'll break them open for you. Well then, have a fun journey with your pets!

194085.「他にも用があれば なんなりと どうぞ。\n<break>:
If there's anything else you need, I'm at
your service.<break>

194086.「やめるのかい？\n 他にも用があれば なんなりと どうぞ。\n<break>:
Finished? If there's anything else
you need, I'm at your service.<break>

194087.「ついてクンは ヤクウっていう\n 知り合いの じいさんが 錬金術で作った\n:
My friend Yakuzu... is a mysterious pet-like creature... that my grandfather created through alchemy. On your journey, if you find
a capsule that contains Follow Me, please bring it to me... I've made it so that you can carry it around with you... as a cute
little sidekick that will follow you around. Each species has its own personality. If you observe them, you may discover many things...
I can't participate in the battle against the demons, but once I have it, I'll treasure it and take care of it forever...

194088.「というわけで\n 他にも用があれば なんなりと どうぞ。\n<break>:
So, if there's anything else you need, I'm at
your service.<break>

194659.「それだと 今 連れているのと 同じだよ。\n 別の ついてクンを 選ばなきゃ。:
That's the same one you're using now. Please
choose a different one.

194702.「連れている ついてクンがいたら\n 休ませてあげることが できるけど\n 今は:
You don't have a pet following you right now.
So, you can't let one rest.

196082.「やあ いらっしゃい。\n ここは 玩具屋だよ。\n 今日は どんな用かな？\n:
Hi, welcome. This is the Toy Shop. What can
I do for you today?
<break>

249975.「おや？ それは\n <%sL_MINION>の カプセルじゃないか？\n それ:
Hm? That's a <%sL_MINION>, isn't
it? Do you want me to break it open and let
